strapiEvent.name: Advanced Orchid Class
strapiEvent.location: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks - Fayetteville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
This class builds on the Basic Orchid Care class and takes a deeper dive into orchid care. It covers a variety of different mediums you can use to grow orchids, and goes into more detail about water quality, light quality, and fertilizer. It also covers growing orchids under artificial light as well as pest management and how to recognize what’s wrong with a plant that isn’t doing well.

Everyone who attends this class will get a $5 coupon to the Orchid Show & Sale on March 3-5, 2023.

FREE/members or $15/nonmembers
